name: The Desert (Jaden Romilio)
description:
The Desert

The Desert is a first-person sandbox game where the player takes control of a sand tobogganing expert. Explore the massive desert to find secrets or find the biggest sand dunes known to man to ride down them at speeds of light on your toboggan.

What Is The Desert?

I created The Desert due to my recent trip to Moreton Island over the holidays. During that time, I got to experience 'The Desert,' a place covered in massive sand dunes that you could toboggan down. After getting the requirements for the assignment 'Leaving your Fingerprints,' I knew I had to make a game about sand to tobogganing to see if I could capture the beauty of tobogganing down massive sand dunes within a video game. Enjoy :) P.S Thank you Hydration Station for always being there <3

Key Features

Tobogganing

Exploration for Secrets

Multiple Game Modes 

Controller completely supported

Controls

Keyboard & Mouse:

WASD = Movement

Mouse = Camera rotation

Space = Toboggan mode

Controller:

Left joystick = MovementRight

joystick = Camera rotation

A = Toboggan mode
